title: Team Mascot - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Team Mascot Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for entertaining and motivating fans, and to make promotional appearances throughout New England. The mascot's role is to generate crowd enthusiasm and to serve as a goodwill...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
